Module com.example.softwareproject
Package com.example.softwareproject.controllers

Class AddModifyProductController

java.lang.Object
com.example.softwareproject.controllers.AddModifyProductController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddModifyProductController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Class that controls the product screen used to add or modify products.
Author:
Kelsey Holley

    • AddModifyProductController

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes components for the add/modify product screen. Sets up the tables containing all parts and associated parts, sets to blank tables if empty. Sets header text to "Add Product" or "Modify Product" depending on which button is clicked. If modifying, sets text fields and tables to contain the already existing data.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url -
      resourceBundle -

    • onRemovePart

      public void onRemovePart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Removes the selected associated part when Remove button is clicked. Implements a confirmation dialog box when button is clicked. If user confirms, performs deletion and sets table.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Event caused by user clicking the remove button

    • onAddPart

      public void onAddPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Adds part to the associated parts list when user clicks the add button. Alerts the user if trying to add without selecting a part.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Event caused by user clicking the add button

    • onSave

      public void onSave(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Saves the entered product information when the user clicks the save button. Creates a new product if adding, and replaces old product with new information if modifying. Input validation performed before saving.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Event caused by user clicking the save button
      Throws:
      IOException

    • backToMain

      private void backToMain() throws IOException
      Loads the main screen.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onCancel

      public void onCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Sends user back to main screen when the cancel button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Event cause by clicking the cancel button
      Throws:
      IOException

    • checkIfBlank

      private String checkIfBlank(String input, String inputValue) throws Exception
      Checks if user input is blank and displays dialog box if blank. Used for validating inputs when saving.
      Parameters:
      input - Name of input being checked, will be displayed to user in error message if needed
      inputValue - Value of user input being checked
      Throws:
      Exception

    • onSearch

      public void onSearch(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Searches parts for part ID or partial name entered by user and displays the results in the table. If no search term entered, will display all parts in inventory.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Event caused by user pressing enter while in the search box
